sql.query: UPDATE institutional_subscription_ip isp SET isp.ip_start = (SELECT tisp.ip_start FROM temp_institutional_subscription_ip tisp WHERE tisp.institutional_subscription_ip_id = isp.institutional_subscription_ip_id)

UPDATE institutional_subscription_ip isp SET isp.ip_end = (SELECT tisp.ip_end FROM temp_institutional_subscription_ip tisp WHERE tisp.institutional_subscription_ip_id = isp.institutional_subscription_ip_id)
